DialogCookie.title: 🍪 Cookie Agreement
DialogCookie.content: This site uses cookies to ensure that you get the best possible user experience. By continuing to use this site, you agree to our cookie policy.

CookiesPrivacyContent.content:
Cookie Policy

Last Updated: {lastModify}

What are Cookies?

Cookies are small pieces of data stored on your device when you visit a website. They help websites remember information about you, such as your preferences or other settings, to provide you with a better user experience on subsequent visits.

Using User Nicknames to Send Files to Telegram

We may use cookies to store the username you manually enter on our website for sending processed files to your personal Telegram messages. This information will be used exclusively for this purpose and will not be shared with third parties.

How Can You Manage Cookies?

Most web browsers allow you to manage cookies through the browser settings. You can set your browser to block all cookies or notify you when they are created. Please note that blocking cookies may affect your user experience and the functionality of the website.

Changes to the Cookie Policy

We may periodically update this cookie policy, so we advise you to review this page periodically to stay informed of any changes. The last update to this cookie policy is noted above.

Contact Us

If you have any questions regarding this cookie policy, please contact us at yaroslav.honchar.1@gmail.com.
